name: Ageri Mosque Construction
description: Help us build a permanent, safe, and beautiful mosque for the community of Ageri.
longDescription: The Ageri community currently prays in a temporary structure that is exposed to the elements. This project aims to construct a durable mosque that can accommodate over 200 worshippers, providing a dedicated space for prayers, community gatherings, and Islamic education for children.
budgetPhases: [{"phaseName":"Phase 1: Foundation & Land Prep","amountUSD":15000},{"phaseName":"Phase 2: Walls, Columns & Roofing","amountUSD":25000},{"phaseName":"Phase 3: Finishing (Plaster, Paint, Windows)","amountUSD":12000},{"phaseName":"Phase 4: Wudu Area & Facilities","amountUSD":8000}]

name: Hidayah Mosque Expansion
description: Expanding the Hidayah Mosque to accommodate the growing Muslim population.
longDescription: The Hidayah Mosque has been a central pillar of the community for years, but it's now too small for the growing number of attendees, especially during Friday prayers. This project will expand the main prayer hall, add new wudu (ablution) facilities, and construct classrooms for a new madrasa.
budgetPhases: [{"phaseName":"Phase 1: Expansion Foundation","amountUSD":20000},{"phaseName":"Phase 2: Main Hall Extension","amountUSD":35000},{"phaseName":"Phase 3: New Wudu Facilities","amountUSD":10000},{"phaseName":"Phase 4: Madrasa Classrooms","amountUSD":10000}]
